name: Format\ImageFill
description: The object for adding an image background fill to a component.

properties.name: URL
properties.description: The URL of the image file to use for filling the component.

properties.name: attachment
properties.description: A string that indicates how the fill should behave when a user scrolls.

properties.name: fillMode
properties.description: A string that indicates how the image fill should be displayed.

properties.name: horizontalAlignment
properties.description: A string that sets the horizontal alignment of the image fill within its component. Valid values:

properties.name: verticalAlignment
properties.description: A string that sets the vertical alignment of the image fill within its component. Valid values:
